titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SECONDARY DIAGNOSIS (CANCER COMMENT) - Description

body.p: SECONDARY DIAGNOSIS (CANCER COMMENT) is the same as attribute PERSON OBSERVATION TEXT STRING .

SECONDARY DIAGNOSIS (CANCER COMMENT) is free text further information recorded for the SECONDARY DIAGNOSIS (ICD) where there are other significant conditions (e.g. Downs Syndrome, Neurofibromatosis Type1 (NF1), Fanconi) which may predispose to cancer or influence treatment during a Cancer Care Spell .
